string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: v3.0.5: set textview to autotext, add send to menu
v3.0.4: add clear recipients button, fix some minor issues
v3.0.3: fix thread for sent messages
v3.0.1: fix migration from beta, fix sending to multiple recipients for some connectors
v3.0: split connectors to separate packages (check market!), add emoticons button
v2.9.3: minor changes, fix o2 captcha
v2.9.2: fix arcor with unlimited sms, allow to hide cancel button
v2.9: add support for arcor.de, add hdpi icon
